CC: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-02-03 12:46
Subject: RE: STORE CLOSURE - Stella MCcartney Dubai Mall on Tue 25th Feb 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Stella MacCartney Dubai Mall on Tuesday 25th Feb 2024.

 You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Ahmed Zakaria <mailto:Ahmed.Zakaria@chalhoub.com>  @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com> @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Jerbie Bartolome <mailto:Jerbie.Bartolome@chalhoub.com> @Babu Kodithodika <mailto:Kodithodika.Babu@puigme.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment/CCTV dismantling) @StellaMcCartney Dubaimall <mailto:StellaMcCartney.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Omar TAMIM <mailto:Omar.Tamim@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 25th Feb . @StellaMcCartney Dubaimall <mailto:StellaMcCartney.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Omar TAMIM <mailto:Omar.Tamim@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred to Account Team in HO1 atten: Ghouse @Omar TAMIM <mailto:Omar.Tamim@chalhoub.com> @StellaMcCartney Dubaimall <mailto:StellaMcCartney.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 18th Feb before trading hours.

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

.com>; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: STORE CLOSURE - Stella MCcartney Dubai Mall on Tue 25th Feb 2025
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Closure of Store “Stella McCartney Boutique at Dubai Mall” the Closure date is on Tue 25th Feb 25 and Surrender date: 28th Feb 2025.

 

Surrender condition : as is 

 

 To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out at 050-3859997.

Best Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

Dear All,

 You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

Subject: RE: STORE CLOSURE - Stella MCcartney Dubai Mall on Tue 25th Feb 2025

Dear All,

 

Please be advised that the closure of Stella McCartney has been put on hold until further notice. Kindly suspend all related processes for the time being. We will provide an update with a confirmed date as soon as possible.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

 

Kind regards,

chalhoub.com> >; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com <mailto:Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: STORE CLOSURE - Stella MCcartney Dubai Mall on Tue 25th Feb 2025

 

Dear All,

 Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Stella MacCartney Dubai Mall on Tuesday 25th Feb 2024.

 You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Ahmed Zakaria <mailto:Ahmed.Zakaria@chalhoub.com>  @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com> @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Jerbie Bartolome <mailto:Jerbie.Bartolome@chalhoub.com> @Babu Kodithodika <mailto:Kodithodika.Babu@puigme.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment/CCTV dismantling) @StellaMcCartney Dubaimall <mailto:StellaMcCartney.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Omar TAMIM <mailto:Omar.Tamim@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 25th Feb . @StellaMcCartney Dubaimall <mailto:StellaMcCartney.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Omar TAMIM <mailto:Omar.Tamim@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred to Account Team in HO1 atten: Ghouse @Omar TAMIM <mailto:Omar.Tamim@chalhoub.com> @StellaMcCartney Dubaimall <mailto:StellaMcCartney.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 18th Feb before trading hours.

u <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 18th Feb before trading hours.
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 18th Feb 25 before trading hours by @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Ahmed Zakaria <mailto:Ahmed.Zakaria@chalhoub.com> @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 
*	All contracts documents to be cancelled on 28th Feb  @Shibu <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Connie <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Mary <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  @Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  @Sharon <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>  @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please inform TG team to collect all cash from boutique on 26th Feb morning and cancel their service as well from 27th Feb.
*	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure to share the Audited sales report after the store closure.
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com> @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure Dewa Etisalat accounts are closed.
*	@jerbie <mailto:Naeem.Baniameen@puigme.com>   raise an MDM request to close store ID after confirming that all transactions are proceeded in system and nothing pending.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out at 050-3859997.

Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

DUBAI

Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com <mailto:Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: STORE CLOSURE - Stella MCcartney Dubai Mall on Tue 25th Feb 2025
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Closure of Store “Stella McCartney Boutique at Dubai Mall” the Closure date is on Tue 25th Feb 25 and Surrender date: 28th Feb 2025.

 

Surrender condition : as is 

 

 To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out at 050-3859997.

Best Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​
